# SchemaJeli Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-08

## Active Technologies
- PostgreSQL 15+ with Prisma Migrate (all entities use soft deletes via `deletedAt` field) (master)

- TypeScript with Node.js 18+ LTS (backend), React 19 with TypeScript (frontend) + Express.js, Prisma ORM, MSAL (Azure Entra ID), Zustand, Tailwind CSS v4, Vite (master)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript with Node.js 18+ LTS (backend), React 19 with TypeScript (frontend): Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes
- master: Added TypeScript with Node.js 18+ LTS (backend), React 19 with TypeScript (frontend) + Express.js, Prisma ORM, MSAL (Azure Entra ID), Zustand, Tailwind CSS v4, Vite
